xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.create_limit_buy_order module¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.create_limit_buy_order.create_limit_buy_order(self, symbol: MarketSymbol, amount: Union[str, int, float], price: Union[str, int, float], params: CreateLimitBuyOrderParams = CreateLimitBuyOrderParams(expiration=None, memos=None, flags=None)) → CreateLimitBuyOrderResponse[source]¶

Places a Limit Buy Order on the Ripple dEX.

Parameters:

  • symbol (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.MarketSymbol) – Market symbol for new Order

  • amount (float) – How much currency you want to trade (in units of base currency)

  • price (float) – Price at which the order is to be fullfilled (in units of quote currency)

  • params (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CreateLimitBuyOrderParams) – (Optional) Additional request parameters

Returns:

ID of created Order

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CreateLimitBuyOrderResponse

xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.create_order module¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.create_order.create_order(self, symbol: MarketSymbol, side: OrderSide, type: OrderType, amount: Union[str, int, float], price: Union[str, int, float], params: CreateOrderParams = CreateOrderParams(expiration=None, account_txn_id=None, fee=None, flags=None, last_ledger_sequence=None, memos=None, offer_sequence=None, sequence=None, source_tag=None)) → CreateOrderResponse[source]¶

Places an Order on the Ripple dEX.

Parameters:

  • symbol (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.MarketSymbol) – Market symbol for new Order

  • side (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.OrderSide) – Order direction (buy or sell)

  • type (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.OrderType) – Order type. Only limit orders are supported

  • amount (float) – How much currency you want to trade (in units of base currency)

  • price (float) – Price at which the order is to be fullfilled (in units of quote currency)

  • params (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CreateOrderParams) – (Optional) Additional request parameters

Returns:

ID of created Order

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CreateOrderResponse

Creates a Trust Line to a currency Issuer on the XRPL ledger.

Parameters:

  • code (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CurrencyCode) – Code for an issued (non-XRP) currency

  • amount (float) – Max amount of this currency you can receive

xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.fetch_canceled_orders module¶

async xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.fetch_canceled_orders.fetch_canceled_orders(self, symbol: Optional[MarketSymbol] = None, since: Optional[int] = None, limit: Optional[int] = 20, params: FetchCanceledOrdersParams = FetchCanceledOrdersParams(search_limit=200)) → List[Order][source]¶

Fetches a list of canceled Orders from the dEX.

Parameters:

  • symbol (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.MarketSymbol) – (Optional) Market symbol to filter Orders by

  • since (int) – (Optional) Only return Orders since this date

  • limit (int) – (Optional) Total number of Orders to return (default is 20)

  • params (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.FetchCanceledOrdersParams) – (Optional) Additional request parameters

Returns:

List of retrieved Orders

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.FetchCanceledOrdersResponse

  • amount (float) – How much currency you want to trade (in units of base currency)

Places a Limit Sell Order on the Ripple dEX.

  • amount (float) – How much currency you want to trade (in units of base currency)

  • price (float) – Price at which the order is to be fullfilled (in units of quote currency)

xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.create_order(self, symbol: MarketSymbol, side: OrderSide, type: OrderType, amount: Union[str, int, float], price: Union[str, int, float], params: CreateOrderParams = CreateOrderParams(expiration=None, account_txn_id=None, fee=None, flags=None, last_ledger_sequence=None, memos=None, offer_sequence=None, sequence=None, source_tag=None)) → CreateOrderResponse[source]¶

Places an Order on the Ripple dEX.

Parameters:

  • symbol (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.MarketSymbol) – Market symbol for new Order

  • side (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.OrderSide) – Order direction (buy or sell)

  • type (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.OrderType) – Order type. Only limit orders are supported

  • amount (float) – How much currency you want to trade (in units of base currency)

  • price (float) – Price at which the order is to be fullfilled (in units of quote currency)

  • params (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CreateOrderParams) – (Optional) Additional request parameters

Returns:

ID of created Order

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CreateOrderResponse

  • amount (float) – Max amount of this currency you can receive

Returns:

Newly created Trust Line

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.CreateTrustLineResponse

Returns information about an account’s balances.

Results are sorted by currency and funds availability.

Balance information

async xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.fetch_canceled_orders(self, symbol: Optional[MarketSymbol] = None, since: Optional[int] = None, limit: Optional[int] = 20, params: FetchCanceledOrdersParams = FetchCanceledOrdersParams(search_limit=200)) → List[Order][source]¶

Fetches a list of canceled Orders from the dEX.

Parameters:

  • symbol (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.MarketSymbol) – (Optional) Market symbol to filter Orders by

  • since (int) – (Optional) Only return Orders since this date

  • limit (int) – (Optional) Total number of Orders to return (default is 20)

  • params (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.FetchCanceledOrdersParams) – (Optional) Additional request parameters

Returns:

List of retrieved Orders

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.FetchCanceledOrdersResponse

async xrpl_dex_sdk.methods.fetch_closed_orders(self, symbol: Optional[MarketSymbol] = None, since: Optional[int] = None, limit: Optional[int] = 20, params: FetchClosedOrdersParams = FetchClosedOrdersParams(search_limit=200)) → List[Order][source]¶
